text:
@KenRoth The only thing PM Modi is aggressively attacking is the Poor of India NOT Coronavirus..
It is the non BJP state chief ministers of India that are aggressively attacking corona virus despite PM Modi depriving em of funds..
#IndiaStarving
#IndiaDeservesBetter
#IndianMuslimsInDanger
